abstract: Judge Alexander Ekstrom orders Barronelle Stutzman, owner of Arlene's Flowers and Gifts in Richland, Wash, to pay $1,000 fine for refusing to provide flowers for same-sex wedding in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A florist who refused to provide flowers for a same-sex wedding has been fined $1,000.

headline.main: Washington: Florist Fined for Refusing Service
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Northwest; Washington: Florist Fined for Refusing Service

snippet: A florist who refused to provide flowers for a same-sex wedding has been fined $1,000.
